content: f99 fino shadow cowl by fairmount fibers design team all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/6/18 © fairmount fibers ltd 2018 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 2 f99 size instructions 24½ circumference x 12¼ deep with e cast on 150 sts join being careful not to twist and place marker to show beginning of round purl 1 round knit 1 materials round twice join b and beginning with round 3 work 20 rnds of manos del uruguay fino 70% extrafine merino 30% silk shadow pattern using e as mc and b as cc cut e 1 mini-skein kit 5 skeins each approx 20g/98yds shown in fm08 henrietta 421 havisham a 401 corsage b 435 join a and continue in shadow pattern for 24 rnds using a as opal c 404 watered silk d 414 ivory letter-opener e mc and b as cc cut b us #5/3 75mm 16 circular ndl or size to obtain gauge join d and continue in shadow pattern for 20 rnds using a as ring marker mc and d as cc cut a tapestry needle join c and continue in shadow pattern for 28 rnds using c as gauge mc and d as cc cut d 24 sts and 40 row = 4 in shadow pattern rejoin e and continue in shadow pattern for 20 rnds using c stitch guide as mc and e as cc cut c shadow pattern any number of stitches round 1 with mc knit to end of round remove m k into st rejoin b and continue in shadow pattern for 14 rnds using b below first st on left ndl replace m on right ndl as mc and e as cc cut e round 2 with mc knit round 3 with cc knit to end of round remove m k into st continuing with b alone knit 1 round purl 1 round twice bind below first st on left ndl replace m on right ndl off knitwise cut yarn and fasten_off round 4 with cc purl repeat rnds 1 through 4 for shadow pattern finishing weave in ends steam-block if desired abbreviations cc contrast color m marker mc main color ndl needle repeat repeat round round st s stitch es all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/6/18 © fairmount fibers ltd 2018 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 2
